explains: v. 预想（preconceive 的过去式及过去分词）
adj. （思想或观点）事先形成的

sentences.en: We all start with preconceived notions of what we want from life.
sentences.cn: 我们开始时都对自己想从生活中获得什么抱有一些预想。

sentences.en: Before I started the job, I had no preconceived notions of what it would be like.
sentences.cn: 开始做这工作之前，我并未预想过它的实际情况。

sentences.en: You will also need to change some preconceived ideas and habits.
sentences.cn: 你也需要改变一下既成的想法和习惯。
